application.name: Filzhut.net amazon_functions for PHP
application.author: Daniel Filzhut
application.price: Free for non-commercial users with quarterly referral fees <$50, all others please contact author for registering information
application.description: Use Amazon.com's XML-API "Amazon Web Services 1.0" to create small product-teasers as well as a complete online-store & start earn provisions on every sold product. It has never been easier to retrieve detailed product-information like Author, Price, Manufacturer, Salesrank, Reviews and much more. The functions include an XML-parser; search-functions for author, director, artist etc.; functions to create pages with detailed product-information, search-forms,... Easy to set up and ready for use in minutes!

new_features.feature: Changed XML-URL from http://xml.amazon.com/onca/xml to http://xml.amazon.com/onca/xml3
Changed setup-vars from variables to constants
